p:
δ 18O and δ 13C range from -3.74 to -5.99% and from -6.15 to -11.07%, respectively (
S2 Fig, S3 File, S1 Dataset ). There is a positive correlation between δ 18O and δ 13C along the growth axis in all three growth periods: #1 r = 0.80 (n = 113), #2 r = 0.84 (n = 146), and #3 r = 0.66 (n = 96), all significant at the 95% level.
